channel.title: In-game commands and a few questions (im new)
channel.description:
I downloaded the (client i think) moparscape w/ aryan thing.... anyway i ran the installer and the game is working
I have a few commands from the net ::pickup (itemID) (number of item) ::npc (npcID)
post anymore that you know because the internet is not helping at this point....
how to spawn objects is a major thing im wanting
when I use the command ::npc why dont they move? ... and how to get them to move
btw why isnt there a sticky thread for new users for this prepwork!!
link me anything that might help

item.title: In-game commands and a few questions (im new)
item.dc:creator: @krandolv krandolv
item.description:
@krandolv wrote:

to Skillz4me,
what source would you reccomend?
im making this for me only so thx anyway on the server tut

to teh_codex,
what does ::master and ::pure do?

to any1 who can anwser,
and wat does all the tut’s mean by write it to the client.java file where would that be its not in any file that i downloaded! … is that the .class files?

ok another question…
I hav downloaded the DeltaScape client and Source code I start the client by clicking run in my V4 Client then i click run in the source file once they load i hit the log in button put in my username and my pass( :mad: which took me forever cus it doesnt show the line there and i had 2 click everywhere :mad:) i couldnt find how to change server or port so i ran it when it logged me in it didnt even load and it disconnected me and when i tryed 2 log in again it said i was logged in and wouldnt work!!!

PLZ respond if u kno the anwser

Read full topic
